ygData.subject: Leaterfoot cap and Erud's Tonic
ygData.msgSnippet: For Erud s Tonic check out the eq_brewers list on one-list for a run down on how to do it. What I need to know about the Leatherfoot Raider s cap is what to
ygData.messageBody:
For Erud's Tonic check out the eq_brewers list on
one-list for a run down on how to do it.

What I need to know about the Leatherfoot Raider's
cap is what to say to the Marshal. I completed
the squad ring quest, the little guys regard me
warmly, I just don't know what to say to the
Marshal.

After I hail him, he says something about
petitioning. I say "i am petitioning" and then
he says he the head of the [Leatherfoot Raiders].
It is at this point that I am stuck, because
he will only a "what" style of question which
does not initiate the quest and I've tried saying
things like "i want to join the leatherfoot
raiders".

mike
